xmldoc.short_description: Compares first n characters of strings.

param_input_item.param_description: a string, string array or cell of strings.
a string, string array or cell of strings.
an integer value: numbers of characters to compare.

param_output_item.param_description: a logical: true if the two are identical and false otherwise.

xmldoc.description: strncmp compares the first n characters of two strings (case sensitive).
